reviewText: these are all new songs ,claims to be,I do not understand whether this is music or making noise,these are not songs rather talking.

For people like me who are used to old-school mostly squeaky-clean Bollywood, this isn't it.  Only an issue for me because I bought it to share with my toddlers.  Other than trying a bit too hard to push the envelope here and there, it's the usual hodge-podge.
The problem I have with this disc is that it doesn't want to play on 3 of 4 players that I own. I don't have any idea why it is so finicky. I will not buy any more from this company.
This DVD did not play smoothly. When it did play only on my laptop, many of the songs were slow and definitely not groovy. Only about 15 of the songs were any good.
Love the dvd but wish it had dance mixes on it. It could be a great dvd. Also should have more selection of songs from more movies .

no subtitles but the video quality is first class
many of the songs are from recent Bollywood movies.
I like it.

Fifty videos from several recent releases like RA-One, Desi Boyz, Bodyguard, Rockstar, Ready, The Dirty Picture and others.  This is a great sampler in terms of the stars in the films, the musical direction and (to varying degrees) the story arc of the picture.  This allows you to get a glimpse of a wide variety of films and perhaps take a chance on a movie you might otherwise have missed.  SRK and Salman Khan have built-in audiences for their films, but this little treasure chest might open some new favorites for you as well.
i am ecstatic or overjoy with the fact that i came across bollywood music and movies, didn't know how fun they were.i will be purchasing more of hindu or bollywood items in the future,thanks
